ygData.subject: RE: Neriak Faction for Humans
ygData.msgSnippet: There is only one way to raise faction with the majority of guilds in Neriak and that is to kill the Wood Elf slaves in Crushbone - the crushbone orcs are
ygData.messageBody:
There is only one way to raise faction with the majority of guilds in Neriak
and that is to kill the Wood Elf slaves in Crushbone - the crushbone orcs
are allied with the DE royal family so helping the orcs in their war against
the elves helps you to raise faction.

Nenadar
Lord of the Dark Realm
Bristlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: 11 October 1999 21:54
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Neriak Faction for Humans


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>

Whats the best way for me to raise Neriak faction.
I and Dubious in most places, appre to SKs and Necros,
and KOS to warriors.
I would like to build it up some though.

Killing halflings in Nektulos only raises it with the
roaming DE guards.
Killing the halfling in the pool, only lowers it with
other halflings.

The only quest that looks like i might be able to do
are the Dark Sisters quests. But i need items from
Lower Guk for most of them. Which would make for a not
very speedy way of doing it.

Its only a matter of time before i am KOS in both
North FP and Qeynos. Which will only leave HP and
neriak for me to do banking. So i would like my new
home to at least like me some :)

Any suggestions?

Bathory D'Allatu
